description.value:
You quickly fix your innovation, at the cost of its stability. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Repair] your innovation almost immediately. You don't have to place the innovation on a flat surface, but you do need to be adjacent to it (including holding or wearing it), as well as having a repair kit as normal.

@Check[type:flat|dc:17|name:Unstable Flat Check|showDC:all|traits:unstable]{Unstable Check}

On a failure, the innovation malfunctions in a spectacular (though harmless) fashion, such as a belch of smoke or shower of sparks, and it becomes incapable of being used for further unstable actions.

On a critical failure, you also take @Damage[(@actor.level)[fire]]{fire damage} equal to your level.
